events.name: eds-navigation-main-item-selected
events.description:
Fired when a main item is selected and the sub menu will open.
The detail object will contain the item that has been selected

events.name: eds-navigation-main-item-hovered
events.description:
Fired when a main item is selected and the sub menu will open.
The detail object will contain the item that has been selected

events.name: eds-navigation-sub-item-selected
events.description:
Fired when a sub item (in the panel) is selected.
The detail object will contain the item that has been selected

properties.name: items
megaMenu
properties.description:
Whether the navigation is in mega menu mode, changing the visual of menus as
well as allowing two levels of children per main item

properties.name: type
properties.description: Size of Navigation, valid values are: `default`, `skinny` This is an optional property. By default, navigation will be rendered with type `default`.

properties.name: useHover
properties.description: Setting to use a hover behavior to open submenus

EDSNavigation.description:
**Navigation** contains actions and functionality that enables
the user to navigate through various workflows and information within the
software application via a menu system extending off the masthead.
EDSNavigation.name: Navigation
EDSNavigation.usage:
The navigation can be used in a masthead. Use the `items` property to fill the navigation

The following css variables are available for styling :

CSS Variable | Description
:----------------|:-------------
--eds-navigation-main-item-background-color | Background color for main navigation items
--eds-navigation-item-background-color | Background color for navigation/sidenav
--eds-navigation-item-selected-background-color | Selected background color for navigation/sidenav
--eds-navigation-color | Text color for navigation/sidenav
--eds-navigation-subitem-color | Color for children of a main item
--eds-navigation-selected-border | Main item border color for navigation/sidenav
--eds-navigation-item-hover-border | Item hover border color for navigation/sidenav
--eds-navigation-inner-shadow-color | Inner box shadow color for navigation menu panel
--eds-navigation-outer-shadow-color | Outer box shadow color for navigation menu panel
--eds-navigation-active-background | Background color for main navigation active state
--eds-navigation-active-color | Text color for main navigation active state
--eds-navigation-megamenu-item-heading-color | Color for the megamenu heading for navigation
